column4: Hi there guys I been trying to install ubuntu 8.04 lt to a partition I created in the existing windows installation when I boot ubuntu for first time after (install within windows) it sets up ubuntu and reboots when I select ubuntu form the OS boot check it loads until it displays cannot find disk (hd0,4) error 21 and it displays that for every other entry on boot menu
try just installing ubuntu normally instead of using the windows installer
the main part of the hard drive
why do you have so many hard drives
which hard drive do you use to boot your machine
and you are installing bootloader to (hd2) ?
if you boot/install with just the IDE drive it still doesn't work?
your windows is installed on /dev/sdc, which is your ide drive, right?
i've told you, don't install grub to sdc2
